description: A vulnerability was determined in jairiidriss RestaurantWebsite up to e7911f12d035e8e2f9a75e7a28b59e4ef5c1d654. Impacted is an unknown function of the component Make a Reservation. This manipulation of the argument selected_date causes cross site scripting. The attack can be initiated remotely. The exploit has been publicly disclosed and may be utilized. Continious delivery with rolling releases is used by this product. Therefore, no version details of affected nor updated releases are available. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
